title: Ukraine seeks "immediate ceasefire" and Russian withdrawal in 1st direct talks during Putin's ongoing invasion - CBS News
content:
1. Ukraine seeks "immediate ceasefire" and Russian withdrawal in 1st direct talks during Putin's ongoing invasion  CBS News
  2. Massive Explosion Heard From Kyiv After Ukraine Officials Push For Cease-Fire  NBC News
  3. Russian artillery kills 70 Ukrainian soldiers at military base, official says; US expels Russian diplomats: live updates  USA TODAY
  4. Russia-Ukraine War News: Live Updates  The New York Times
  5. Latest Russia-Ukraine war news: Russian convoy nears Kyiv, Kharkiv faces shelling  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: As Putin talks nuclear "deterrence" and continues his assault on Ukraine, Kyiv says the "key issue" in talks is "an immediate ceasefire" and Russian withdrawal.
